Plot: Two scrappy 13-year-old working-class friends in Bradford seek fortune by getting involved with a local scrap dealer and criminal.
Title: The Selfish Giant
Writer: Clio Barnard, Oscar Wilde (inspired by 'The Selfish Giant')
Actors: Conner Chapman, Shaun Thomas, Ralph Ineson, Ian Burfield
tomatoConsensus: Starkly emotional and beautifully directed, The Selfish Giant uses a lovely script and some powerful performances to present some of the best that modern British cinema has to offer.
